poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Beardy Brahms might just be Tattering the kip with Mrs Robert Schumann, tickled at a Quip on horns in a string quartet.
Robert composes revenge in two movements: A clip on the lug and a flintlock duet, Or maybe a fantasy: press-gang the rival, Bob walking off with a smirk on his coupon And crimpage in his pocket - crisp, Silvery notes, legal tender in Bedlam.
